pips-solver/src/services/extraction/vali.description: Severity classification system with DISAGREEMENT_SEVERITY_MAP, classifyDisagreementSeverity(), and utility functions for filtering/sorting. Critical = affects solvability (grid_dimensions, hole_position, domino_count). Warning = may affect solution (region_assignment, constraints, domino_value). Info = cosmetic.

pips-solver/src/app/components/Extractio.description: Edge case handling pattern: LoadingState, ErrorState, NoDisagreementsState components for graceful degradation. Uses useEffect with setTimeout(fn, 0) for computation to allow loading UI to render. validateRawResponses() validates data structure before processing. Error recovery via retryKey state pattern.
